dict.string: TruckNav Pro needs your location to show your position on the map and provide turn-by-turn navigation with truck-specific routing.
TruckNav Pro needs continuous access to your location to provide background turn-by-turn navigation, real-time traffic updates, and ETA notifications even when the app is not active.
TruckNav Pro needs continuous access to your location to provide background turn-by-turn navigation and real-time updates.
TruckNav Pro needs precise location data to provide accurate turn-by-turn navigation, lane guidance, and truck-specific routing. Reduced accuracy may result in navigation errors.
